import React from"react";import{useEffect}from"react";import{useRef}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import logo from"../../../../assets/img/logo.png";import gsap from"gsap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Header(){//useRef, animation with gsap
var tl=useRef();var menuLeftRef=useRef();var closeIconRef=useRef();var logoRef=useRef();var navigate=useNavigate();//animation when loading into page
useEffect(function(){tl.current=gsap.timeline().fromTo(menuLeftRef.current,{opacity:0,y:40},{opacity:1,y:0,duration:0.75,delay:1}).fromTo(closeIconRef.current,{opacity:0,rotate:"-360",y:-60},{opacity:1,rotate:0,y:0,duration:1.5},"-=1").fromTo(logoRef.current,{y:40,opacity:0},{y:0,opacity:1,duration:1.5},"-=2");gsap.timeline().fromTo(gsap.utils.selector(".social-list")(".social-icon"),1,{x:"110%",opacity:0},{x:0,opacity:1,stagger:0.5},"+=1");});// animation when close page
var handleClose=function handleClose(){gsap.timeline().to(".wraper",{y:120,duration:1,opacity:0});gsap.timeline().to(".nav",{y:"-100vh",opacity:0,duration:2.5},"-=0.5");gsap.timeline().to(".nav-image",{opacity:0,duration:1});gsap.timeline().to(".social-list",{opacity:0,x:"105%",duration:1.5});gsap.timeline().to(".navigation",{opacity:0,duration:1});gsap.timeline().to(gsap.utils.selector(".social-list")(".social-icon"),1,{x:"110%",opacity:0,duration:1,stagger:0.5});tl.current.reverse();setTimeout(function(){navigate("/");},1800);};//animation when click icon
var handleClickIcon=function handleClickIcon(){gsap.timeline().to(".wraper",{y:120,duration:1,opacity:0});gsap.timeline().to(".nav",{y:"-100vh",opacity:0,duration:2.5},"-=0.5");gsap.timeline().to(".nav-image",{opacity:0,duration:1});gsap.timeline().to(".social-list",{opacity:0,x:"105%",duration:1.5});gsap.timeline().to(".navigation",{opacity:0});gsap.timeline().to(gsap.utils.selector(".social-list")(".social-icon"),1,{x:"105%",opacity:0,stagger:0.3});tl.current.reverse();setTimeout(function(){navigate("/about");},1800);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-template",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-left",ref:menuLeftRef,onClick:handleClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-times",ref:closeIconRef})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"span-close",children:"Close"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-right",onClick:handleClickIcon,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-logo",ref:logoRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"DaiQuocVietCorp"})]})})]})});}
